thread.title: Migos Say Lady Gaga Was "On Fleek" At Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Migos Say Lady Gaga Was "On Fleek" At Super Bowl

author: Shaun M
title: Migos Say Lady Gaga Was "On Fleek" At Super Bowl
text:
Home > Music > Migos Say Lady Gaga Was "On Fleek" At Super Bowl Migos Say Lady Gaga Was "On Fleek" At Super Bowl 0 0 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 8, 2017 at 05:52pm Migos defended Lady Gaga, saying she looked good at the Super Bowl. 
Super Bowl LI attracted its fair share of detractors mainly because of the Patriots' win but also because of Lady Gaga 's performance at the halftime show. Social media critics body-shamed the singer cum actress saying she exhibited some belly flab. TMZ caught up with Migos at the airport in L.A. They defended the diva and said her body looked good. 
"It was on fleek," said Quavo. "Internet not a safe place." 
When asked if Gaga's critics were right, Takeoff said people should "leave her alone," and that they would work with her on a song given the chance. Before the Super Bowl, a petition was floating around to get rid of Gaga and have Migos instead -- and a host of other ATL rappers -- perform songs like "Bad and Boujee" at the halftime show. 
What do you think? Did Gaga look good? A photo posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Feb 7, 2017 at 8:38pm PST
